## About Me!

I am a fourth-year undergraduate at UC Santa Barbara majoring in Earth Science with an emphasis in Climate and Environment and a Field-based Undergraduate Engagement through Research, Teaching, and Education (FUERTE) fellow. Beyond my academics, I am also on the leadership board for the Muckers Earth Science club and have served as president of VocalMotion, UCSB Women's A Cappella group, for the past two years. Furthermore, I have been a member of the UCSB Women's Rugby team for four years.
